title: Player-facing league standings and points table
description: Create a player-facing view of the league standings and points table. The admin interface already has a points table tool, but players currently have no way to see league standings. This should show division-by-division standings with team rankings, points, wins, losses, and draws.
acceptance_criteria: Player-accessible standings page (no login required or token-based access)
Displays team name, played, won, lost, drawn, points
Division selector or tabs for switching between divisions
Current season shown by default with option to view previous seasons
St Ann's teams highlighted for easy identification
Data sourced from existing match results and points calculations

approach: 1. Review existing admin points table service for data logic
3. Query match results aggregated by team and division
4. Build responsive standings template with division tabs
5. Highlight St Ann's teams in the table

testing_requirements: St Ann's teams are visually highlighted
Page loads quickly with all fixture data

context.user_story: As a player, I want to see the current league standings so I know how my team is performing in the division
